title: Rhythmic's Episode Revenant Wishlist
description: Sourced from CoolGuy videos, Datto & some Light.gg info combined with personal opinion

// EPISODE REVENANT SEASONAL ACTIVITIES

// "Bitter/Sweet" (Arc Adaptive GL)

// "Chroma Rush" (Kinetic Auto Rifle)

// "Exuviae"
//notes: CoolGuy PVP recommendations https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01lYlg_Ahzs

// VESPER'S HOST DUNGEON
